scripts.dev: bash -c ". ./graphile-starter-app/.envvar && cd .devcontainer && yarn devcontainer:up && yarn devcontainer:dev "
scripts.work-in-devcontainer: bash -c ". ./graphile-starter-app/.envvar && cd .devcontainer && yarn devcontainer:up && cd .. && yarn attach-to-devcontainer"
scripts.docker-exec-dev: docker-compose -f ./.devcontainer/docker-compose.yml down && docker-compose -f ./.devcontainer/docker-compose.yml up -d dev && docker-compose -f ./.devcontainer/docker-compose.yml exec dev
